original_text: So, as God's people, you must never have sex with anyone that you are not married to. Do not do any kind of disgusting thing like that. Do not want many things for yourselves, just to make you happy. That is not how God's people should live.
korean_text: 음행과 온갖 더러운 것과 탐욕은 너희 중에서 그 이름조차도 부르지 말라 이는 성도에게 마땅한 바니라

sentences.original_text: you must never have sex with anyone
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 결코 누구와도 성관계를 가져서는 안 된다

sentences.original_text: that you are not married to
Do not do any kind of disgusting thing
sentences.korean_translation: 그런 역겨운 종류의 것들을 하지 마라

sentences.original_text: Do not want many things for yourselves
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 자신을 위해 많은 것들을 원하지 마라

sentences.original_text: That is not how God's people should live
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 하나님의 백성이 살아야 할 방법이 아니다
